text: Fu Ming (born 5 January 1983) is a Chinese football referee. He has been a full international referee for FIFA since 2014.FIFA. "China PR: Referees". He is a teacher of Jincheng College of Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics.我心目中的南航金城 On 23 February 2019, it was announced that Fu Ming had been hired by CFA to become one of the professional referees in China. ==AFC Asian Cup 2019== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:1em auto 1em auto; text- align:center; font-size:small;" ! colspan="4" | 2019 AFC Asian Cup – United Arab Emirates |- !
